summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of North and West Seventy-eighth Street from Greenwood Avenue to Eighth Avenue N.W. et al in the City of Seattle, by grading under Ordinance No. 21213, creating Local Improvement District No. 2119 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
